headline: Julianna Margulies Uses Donald Trump Poop Bags To Pick Up After Her Dog
short_description: The "Dietland" actress said using the bags is a "really cathartic, therapeutic moment."

headline: Morgan Freeman 'Devastated' That Sexual Harassment Claims Could Undermine Legacy
short_description: "It is not right to equate horrific incidents of sexual assault with misplaced compliments or humor," he said in a statement.
